ClassHelp.paragraph: Booking menu quick.
From here, you select the basic tour for your proposal.

You already have a basic tour that is pretty close to what you want:
Select the "Seven Day Bangkok Tour" from the drop-down list to the right of the "Tour Code" field.
Next, select a starting date for the tour from the "Departure Date" field, using the Calendar
calendar popup button.
The system will take a few seconds to populate your tour and look up all the tour information, availability, and pricing.

Now that you have selected a tour, continue on to the
Calendar screen tour/buttons/Calendar record=BookingCalendar to customize your tour.
Bookings quick screen.
Here you can see what your tour looks like.

Looks pretty close to what you want. The only change you will make it to move the "Full Day Sightseeing" from the second day of your tour to the third day. Just drag it and drop it on the next day in the calendar.
Hey, that was weird. The sighteeing didn't immediately move. There was a delay, then the icon started flashing. That was the system checking the information, availability, and pricing for the new date.

Okay, you are ready to send this proposal to your agent. Just click on the
Itinerary tour/buttons/Itinerary record=BookingItinerary screen to view your itinerary.
Your sign-in for this quick demonstration is kate@tourgeek.com. Your password is the same password that you entered for your demo account.

Once you sign-in, you will see a display of your current quotes and bookings. Click the
Form screen=BookingMenuScreen Form
button to start a new proposal.

Enter the passengers on this screen.
We'll assume the passengers are already in your system. Click the
Select Passengers screen=PassengerLookup Lookup
button to lookup the passengers.

One your passengers are entered, continue on to the Tour screen=TourEntry tour/buttons/Tour
button to select a main tour.

Enter the passengers on this screen.
We'll assume the passengers are already in your system. Click the
Select Passengers screen=PassengerLookup Lookup
button to lookup the passengers.

One your passengers are entered, continue on to the Tour screen=TourEntry tour/buttons/Tour
button to select a main tour.
Booking header quick.

Select a passenger from the profile system.
Near the bottom of the list, click the
select screen=PassengerLookup Select
button to the left of "James Turn".
After a few seconds, both James and Linda Turn will appear in your passenger screen (since they are linked).
This screen displays your itinerary.

Looks good. Let's send it to our agent. (Since this is your demo, all the email addresses in the system are yours)
Click on the
email EMail record=BookingCalendar
button to the right of your email address.
You're done! See I said it wouldn't take too long.
Check your email. The proposed itinerarary should be there shortly.
Check out some of the other demos. This system will simplify your tour operation considerably!
